Name: DJ KHATI
Additional Details:
Parties, Parties, Parties!
Naturally I am knowledgeable about all types of music, but did you know that I am into costumes and themes, too?I know how to make any celebration—engagement, birthday, anniversary, you name it—a truly special event. And of course I know how to put on parties for all the holidays—Christmas, New Year’s, Valentine’s Day, Easter, Fourth of July, just to name a few. I know how to keep your party moving.I am imaginative and happy to help your vision—no matter how far out it may be—come true!I offers services for the following eventsWedding ReceptionsWhether you want your reception to be serene and sophisticated or rockin’ and rollin’, I can keep your event on track by playing the appropriate music and providing just the right tone in master-of-ceremony service. It’s your special day; just tell me what you’re dreaming of and I will deliver.Corporate FunctionsWant to host the perfect event to impress prospective clients, investors, or partners?
Music can create the atmosphere and help you close the deal. I have performed at cocktail parties, annual corporate meetings, etc.No matter what sort of tone you want to set, I can accommodate with our music selections.In this digital age, sound equipment no longer needs to be heavy and bulky. The following
equipment all fits easily into our van, and it will easily fit into your event space, too.SpeakersI have a variety of state-of-the-art speakers that I employ, depending on the sound
desired and the size of the room. The music can be booming or subdued. It’s your call.LightsI always bring the basic lights I need to work by, but if you want a no-holds-barred
dance party, I can provide a light show as well as the tunes. All effects, from strobes
to jumping lasers are possible, but must be scheduled in advance as I may need to
rent special equipment.Backup EquipmentIt’s a sad fact that electronics often fail. But even if that happens, your event will go on
as scheduled. I always carry sufficient backup equipment to keep the party moving.About KHATIKHATI injects a strong dose of High Energy to the mob through various moods in every performance given for the energetic audiences. He is creative with his talent in all music genres to fit the right occasions for all his clients. He is popular among party people and dance music fans who knows and love him for his years of spinning the best beats at the best clubs and events.
Ankur J Das is the real name of KHATI, before known as DJ ANKUR. He started absorbing influences from Indian Music and passionately indulge himself into mixing and creating Electronic music from a very early age, at 14. Beyond this, it was his love and passion for music which took him into various genres and then to the Psychedelic music as KHATI.
His enormous talent and passionate enthusiasm did not take a long time to set his audience. In 2008, he got the chance to play at a club named Silver Orchid, followed by a long chain of Clubs and Hotels, namely Hotel Kuber International, Hotel Agneedeep Continental, Mejbaan, Zeromile, Delight, etc. as a Residents DJ.
His performances were not confined here, he is the most sought after DJ for the most happening high profile events like Indian Super League, as well as corporate houses and clubs.
He has also collaborated with various International Djs and Musicians of Bollywood and Assamese Music Industry and also creating music covering various genres with a focus on Dance and Psychedelic music.

Name: Rupam Kakoti,Singer,Guwahati,Assam
Additional Details: One of the popular Assamese singer, Rupam Kakoty was born in July 4th 1987 in the Votai Gaon of Nagaon district. He is a devotee to ‘Shankari’ culture and tradition. He has earned a huge popularity by singing ‘Bihu’, modern Assamese songs and spiritual alums like Gajendra Upakhyan, Bandhab and Jadumani.His tune and speech establish a new trend in Assamese music world. He gets tremendous popularity as a stage artist. Moreover he has got the chance to sing with some famous singers like Bhupen Hazarika, Anuradha Podwal, Udit Narayan, Abhijit etc. He is well appreciated by these singing sensations. Jubin Garg also sings several Assamese songs which are composed by Rupam Kakoty.
